verses.verse: And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, <S%H518>if<s%> you shall <S%H8085>listen<s%> diligently to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>observe<s%> and to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>set<s%> you <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1293>blessings<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> you, and <S%H5381>overtake<s%> you, <S%H3588>if<s%> you shall <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> shall you be in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> shall you be in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> shall be the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H990>body,<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>ground,<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H929>cattle,<s%> the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of your <S%H504>cows,<s%> and the <S%H6251>flocks<s%> of your <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> shall be your <S%H2935>basket<s%> and your <S%H4863>store.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> shall you be when you <S%H935>come<s%> in, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> shall you be when you <S%H3318>go<s%> out.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5414>cause<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> that <S%H6965>rise<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> you to be <S%H5062>smitten<s%> before your face: they shall <S%H3318>come<s%> out <S%H413>against<s%> you <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1870>ways.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> on you in your <S%H618>storehouses,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H4916>set<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to; and he shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6965>establish<s%> you an <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to himself, as he has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to you, <S%H3588>if<s%> you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> that you are <S%H7121>called<s%> by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and they shall be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of you.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall make you <S%H3498>plenteous<s%> in <S%H2896>goods,<s%> in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H990>body,<s%> and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>ground,<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> you.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6605>open<s%> to you his <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H214>treasure,<s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H4306>rain<s%> to your <S%H776>land<s%> in his <S%H6256>season,<s%> and to <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and you shall <S%H3867>lend<s%> to <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and you shall not <S%H3867>borrow.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5414>make<s%> you the <S%H7218>head,<s%> and not the <S%H2180>tail;<s%> and you shall be <S%H4605>above<s%> <S%H7535>only,<s%> and you shall not be <S%H4295>beneath;<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> that you <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H8104>observe<s%> and to <S%H6213>do<s%> them:

And you shall not <S%H5493>go<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> from <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left,<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> them.

But it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, <S%H518>if<s%> you will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day;<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7045>curses<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> on you, and <S%H5381>overtake<s%> you:
<S%H779>Cursed<s%> shall you be in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H779>cursed<s%> shall you be in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>
<S%H779>Cursed<s%> shall be your <S%H2935>basket<s%> and your <S%H4863>store.<s%>

<S%H779>Cursed<s%> shall be the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H990>body,<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>land,<s%> the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of your <S%H504>cows,<s%> and the <S%H6251>flocks<s%> of your <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>
<S%H779>Cursed<s%> shall you be when you <S%H935>come<s%> in, and <S%H779>cursed<s%> shall you be when you <S%H3318>go<s%> out.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H7971>send<s%> on you <S%H3994>cursing,<s%> <S%H4103>vexation,<s%> and <S%H4045>rebuke,<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H4916>set<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to for to <S%H6213>do,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> you be <S%H8045>destroyed,<s%> and <S%H5704>until<s%> you <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H4118>quickly;<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7455>wickedness<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings,<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> you have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall make the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> <S%H1692>stick<s%> to you, <S%H5704>until<s%> he have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> you from <S%H5921>off<s%> the <S%H127>land,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> you with a <S%H7829>consumption,<s%> and with a <S%H6920>fever,<s%> and with an <S%H1816>inflammation,<s%> and with an <S%H2746>extreme<s%> <S%H2746>burning,<s%> and with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and with <S%H7711>blasting,<s%> and with <S%H3420>mildew;<s%> and they shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> you <S%H5704>until<s%> you <S%H6>perish.<s%>
And your <S%H8064>heaven<s%> that is <S%H5921>over<s%> your <S%H7218>head<s%> shall be <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> that is <S%H8478>under<s%> you shall be <S%H1270>iron.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H4306>rain<s%> of your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H80>powder<s%> and <S%H6083>dust:<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> shall it <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> on you, <S%H5704>until<s%> you be <S%H8045>destroyed.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5414>cause<s%> you to be <S%H5062>smitten<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies:<s%> you shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> them, and <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them: and shall be <S%H2189>removed<s%> into <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And your <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall be <S%H3978>meat<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>air,<s%> and to the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H369>no<s%> man shall <S%H2729>fray<s%> them away.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5221>smite<s%> you with the <S%H7822>botch<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and with the <S%H6076>tumors,<s%> and with the <S%H1618>scab,<s%> and with the <S%H2775>itch,<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> you <S%H3201>can<s%> not be <S%H7495>healed.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> you with <S%H7697>madness,<s%> and <S%H5788>blindness,<s%> and <S%H8541>astonishment<s%> of <S%H3824>heart:<s%>

And you shall <S%H4959>grope<s%> at <S%H6672>noonday,<s%> as the <S%H5787>blind<s%> <S%H4959>gropes<s%> in <S%H653>darkness,<s%> and you shall not <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in your <S%H1870>ways:<s%> and you shall be <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> and <S%H1497>spoiled<s%> ever <S%H3605>more,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> and <S%H369>no<s%> man shall <S%H3467>save<s%> you.

You shall <S%H781>betroth<s%> a <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H7693>lie<s%> with her: you shall <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house,<s%> and you shall not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein: you shall <S%H5193>plant<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> and shall not <S%H2490>gather<s%> the grapes thereof.

Your <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall be <S%H2873>slain<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof: your <S%H2543>ass<s%> shall be <S%H1497>violently<s%> <S%H1497>taken<s%> away from before your face, and shall not be <S%H7725>restored<s%> to you: your <S%H6629>sheep<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> to your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and you shall have <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H3467>rescue<s%> them.

Your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>look,<s%> and <S%H3615>fail<s%> with longing for them <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> long; and there shall be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H410>might<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

The <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>land,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3018>labors,<s%> shall a <S%H5971>nation<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> not <S%H398>eat<s%> up; and you shall be <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> and <S%H7533>crushed<s%> <S%H3605>always:<s%>
So that you shall be <S%H7696>mad<s%> for the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H7200>see.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> you in the <S%H1290>knees,<s%> and in the <S%H7785>legs,<s%> with a <S%H7451>sore<s%> <S%H7822>botch<s%> that <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> be <S%H7495>healed,<s%> from the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of your <S%H7272>foot<s%> to the <S%H6936>top<s%> of your <S%H6936>head.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3212>bring<s%> you, and your <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H6965>set<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you, to a <S%H1471>nation<s%> which <S%H3808>neither<s%> you nor your <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H3045>known;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> shall you <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone.<s%>

And you shall <S%H1961>become<s%> an <S%H8047>astonishment,<s%> a <S%H4912>proverb,<s%> and a <S%H8148>byword,<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>nations<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5090>lead<s%> you.

You shall <S%H3318>carry<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> out into the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and shall <S%H622>gather<s%> but <S%H4592>little<s%> in; for the <S%H697>locust<s%> shall <S%H2628>consume<s%> it.

You shall <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and <S%H5647>dress<s%> them, but shall <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H3196>wine,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H103>gather<s%> the grapes; for the <S%H8438>worms<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> them.

You shall have <S%H2132>olive<s%> trees throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1366>coasts,<s%> but you shall not <S%H5480>anoint<s%> yourself with the <S%H8081>oil;<s%> for your <S%H2132>olive<s%> shall <S%H5394>cast<s%> his fruit.
You shall <S%H3205>beget<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> but you shall not <S%H1961>enjoy<s%> them; for they shall <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> your <S%H6086>trees<s%> and <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>land<s%> shall the <S%H6767>locust<s%> <S%H3423>consume.<s%>

The <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that is <S%H7130>within<s%> you shall <S%H5927>get<s%> up <S%H5921>above<s%> you <S%H4605>very<s%> <S%H4605>high;<s%> and you shall <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4295>very<s%> <S%H4295>low.<s%>
He shall <S%H3867>lend<s%> to you, and you shall not <S%H3867>lend<s%> to him: he shall be the <S%H7218>head,<s%> and you shall be the <S%H2180>tail.<s%>

Moreover <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7045>curses<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> on you, and shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> you, and <S%H5381>overtake<s%> you, <S%H5704>till<s%> you be <S%H8045>destroyed;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you <S%H8085>listened<s%> not to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you:
And they shall be on you for a <S%H226>sign<s%> and for a <S%H4159>wonder,<s%> and on your <S%H2233>seed<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

<S%H8478>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you <S%H5647>served<s%> not the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H8057>joyfulness,<s%> and with <S%H2898>gladness<s%> of <S%H3824>heart,<s%> for the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> things;

Therefore shall you <S%H5647>serve<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H7971>send<s%> against you, in <S%H7457>hunger,<s%> and in <S%H6772>thirst,<s%> and in <S%H5903>nakedness,<s%> and in <S%H2640>want<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> things: and he shall <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> on your <S%H6677>neck,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he have <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> you.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5375>bring<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you from <S%H7350>far,<s%> from the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> as swift as the <S%H5404>eagle<s%> <S%H1675>flies;<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> you shall not <S%H8085>understand;<s%>

A <S%H1471>nation<s%> of <S%H5794>fierce<s%> <S%H6440>countenance,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall not <S%H5375>regard<s%> the <S%H6440>person<s%> of the <S%H2205>old,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> show <S%H2603>favor<s%> to the <S%H5288>young:<s%>

And he shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>land,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> you be <S%H8045>destroyed:<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> also shall not <S%H7604>leave<s%> you either <S%H1715>corn,<s%> <S%H8492>wine,<s%> or <S%H3323>oil,<s%> or the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of your <S%H504>cows,<s%> or <S%H6251>flocks<s%> of your <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he have <S%H6>destroyed<s%> you.
